page.title: 07KILSBY OLD PEOPLE'S HOME
page.content: There are 18 old people in the home and about 25 helpers to look after them.The helpers like looking after the old people but it is hard work. They bath them,feed them,get them ready for bed,change and dress them, take them to the toilet and talk to them.The helpers all wear a uniform. The old people like the home and enjoy their food.They spend their time watching television,reading, sewing and they talk to each other about the past. They do not have many visitors because their families live so far away but one old lady's daughter visits her every day. The oldest lady is 105 and others are in their nineties. It costs about Â£175 to stay a month.
